source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_00<tab>G'raha Tia seems eager to bear the node away.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_00<tab>ハビスフィア管理局のグ・ラハ・ティアは、いそいそとしている。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_01<tab>Though Cid may be the man best qualified to gain access to the report stored in the Allagan node, G'raha Tia freely admits that his reasons for wanting to visit the engineer are not purely practical. Eager to be reunited with your mutual friend, he sets off for the Rising Stones at a brisk pace, leaving you and Alisaie to follow in his wake.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_01<tab>グ・ラハ・ティアと話した。モードゥナの石の家に戻り「グ・ラハ・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_02<tab>You get back to the Rising Stones to find Krile also returned, and she briefs you on all that transpired at the recent Alliance council. With the Empire still at war with itself, the Alliance has turned its attention to the primal problem once more. Working with friendly factions among the beast tribes, they hope to explore new avenues for peace, a development which only adds to your comrades' determination to find a cure for tempering. On that note, the impromptu meeting concludes, and Tataru suggests you wait for Cid in Dawn's Respite.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_02<tab>グ・ラハ・ティアと話し、クルルから会議の内容を共有してもらった。シドを待つため、石の家の未明の間にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0C401 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_03<tab>G'raha Tia positively beams with delight as Cid enters the chamber, and the pair enjoy a brief but joyous reunion. Soon after, thoughts turn to the matter of the locked report and Cid sets to work. Using the calculating power of a magitek terminal, he succeeds in identifying the late Owen's password, and you watch intently as the Allagan technologist appears in holographic form and explains the mechanism by which eikons make thralls of men. It is duly confirmed that, like those corrupted by Light, the souls of the tempered are subject to stagnation. <var 1A 02 /var>Unlike<var 1A 01 /var> with the victims of the sin eaters, however, you learn that one cannot reanimate a tempered soul without also intensifying the victim's fanatical faith. When you articulate this dilemma, G'raha Tia is inspired to theorize that an adapted version of memory transference might make it possible to perform targeted reanimation, and it is decided that you will rely once more on magitek terminals─this time to formulate a magick.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0C401 /var>で待機し、シドが到着した。魔導端末で情報システムのパスワードを解析し、テンパードのレポートを見て、テンパード治療の魔法を魔導端末で編み出すことになった。石の家の未明の間にいる「シド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_04<tab>While Cid and G'raha Tia configure the terminals, you and the others are tasked with procuring supplies. Ironworks promissory note in hand, you set out for the Skysteel Manufactory in Ishgard to obtain the necessary ceruleum.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_04<tab>シドと話し、冒険者は青燐水を調達することになった。イシュガルドのスカイスチール機工房の「フロムロー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>」を見せよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_05<tab>At the Skysteel Manufactory, you present the promissory note to Fromelaut, who informs you that an engineer at the airship landing will assist you with the ceruleum.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_05<tab>フロムローに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>を見せた。イシュガルド・ランディングの「機工房の技師」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_06<tab>As you converse with the engineer, who should emerge from the landing but Ser Aymeric. Upon learning of your quest to cure tempering, he pledges Ishgard's full support, and sees you off aboard an airship laden with all the ceruleum you require and more.

Some while later, you enter the workshop at Revenant's Toll to find preparations well underway, the terminals successfully configured with the assistance of the ever-capable-if-not-available Nero. After confirming that all is ready, Cid gives the order to begin. While the terminals conduct their endless simulations, you decide to take a moment's rest...and awaken to a scene of chaos as the devices threaten to overload. Mere moments before they break down, the magick is revealed to G'raha Tia, who heaves a sigh of relief before turning to everyone with a smile. At long last, the world has a cure for tempering.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SEQ_06<tab>機工房の技師に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>を渡したところ、アイメリクと出会い、たくさんの青燐水を用立ててくれた。石の家に戻り、シドとその仲間たち、そしてネロの協力によって、魔導端末でテンパード治療の魔法を編み出すことに成功した。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_00<tab>Speak with G'raha Tia at the Rising Stones.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_00<tab>石の家のグ・ラハ・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_01<tab>Wait for Cid in Dawn's Respite.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_01<tab>未明の間の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB0C401 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Cid.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_02<tab>シドと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_03<tab>Show the Ironworks promissory note to Fromelaut at the Skysteel Manufactory.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_03<tab>スカイスチール機工房のフロムローに
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>を見せる

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_04<tab>Hand the Ironworks promissory note to the Skysteel engineer.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TODO_04<tab>機工房の技師に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_100_000<tab>Fine. I'll let Cid try his hand first. But if that doesn't work, we're doing it my way.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_100_000<tab>もし、シドでもどうにもならなかったら、
そのときは、私が玉っころをバラバラにしてやるわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_100_001<tab><blip> Threat detected...
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_100_001<tab>ピピ……近くに脅威を検知しました。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_000<tab>I should probably mention that I have yet to meet Cid since waking up. Rammbroes did send word to the Ironworks, but it appears our friend has been afield on urgent business.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_000<tab>オレが起きたこと、
シドたちにはラムブルースが一報入れてくれたんだ。
忙しいらしくて、それきりになってるけどさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_001<tab>Nevertheless, I assure you my proposal to seek his help is no pretext, however much I might look forward to seeing him again. Him and everyone. But come, let us be on our way.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_001<tab>オーエンのレポートをだしにするわけじゃないが、
あいつらにまた会えるかもしれないのは嬉しいな……。
さっそく戻って、連絡を取るとしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_002<tab>Hehehe! Look at him, all but running... How sweet.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_002<tab>ふふ、今にも走り出しそうな勢いね。
よっぽど嬉しいんじゃない？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_003<tab>Still, it wouldn't do to keep him waiting. Shall we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_003<tab>実際、魔大陸でできそうなことは終わったわけだし、
「石の家」に戻りましょうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Krile's back too. I wonder what was decided at the council...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>クルルが帰ってきてたわ。
会議の内容も気になるところね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_006<tab>I take it you have news to share. So do I.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_006<tab>ついさっき、アラミゴから戻ったところよ。
そちらの活動にも進展があったようね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_007<tab>I'm pleased to see your mission was a success─and in no small part due to the <var 1A 02 /var>Bonanza<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_007<tab>ボナンザ号、大活躍だったみたいでっすね！
ところで、その玉っころは何でっすか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_008<tab><blip> Large lowborn presence detected.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_008<tab>ピピ……多数の一般庶民を検知しました。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_010<tab>Wonderful news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Tataru contacted Cid on our behalf, and he is on his way here even as we speak!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_010<tab>タタルからシドに連絡を入れてもらった。
ちょうど仕事のキリがいいとかで、急いで来てくれるらしい。
へへ……やったな！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_011<tab>While we wait, I should like very much to hear what transpired at the Alliance council. Would you be so kind, Krile?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_011<tab>到着を待つ間に、クルルから、
アラミゴでの会議の結果を聞いておかないか？
帝国の動向も気になるところだしな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_012<tab>As you know, the meeting was convened to discuss how best to respond to recent events in Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_012<tab>アラミゴの会議には、各国盟主たちが集っていたわ。
それで、今後の帝国対策について話し合われたんだけど……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_013<tab>According to intelligence from our Doman allies, the war of succession rages on, and the Empire remains without a leader.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_013<tab>諜報活動を行っているドマの忍びによると、
ヴァリスの死後、未だに皇位の継承が行われておらず、
帝国は元首不在のままらしいの。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_014<tab>Amidst the chaos, the imperial legions in the provinces have begun to move independently of the motherland.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_014<tab>そんな状況だから、各属州の帝国軍も統制から外れ、
独自の動きを見せ始めているらしいわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_015<tab>Of greatest concern to us is the IIIrd, a legion aligned with Lord Nerva. It appears they have received substantial financial backing from House Brutus.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_015<tab>気になるのは、内乱の中心にいるネルウァ……
彼と関係の深い第III軍団に、名門貴族のブルトゥス家から、
多額の支援が行われたらしいという点よ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_016<tab>Brutus... Aren't they the ones who took in Yotsuyu and Asahi? This bodes well...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_016<tab>ブルトゥス家と言えば、あのヨツユやアサヒたちを、
養子に迎え入れていた家門だったわよね？
まったく……嫌な予感しかしないわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_017<tab>Zenos's movements, meanwhile, remain shrouded in mystery. We're hoping that Thancred and Urianger will be able to shed some light on his activities when they return.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_017<tab>ええ、あいかわらず、ゼノスの動向も不透明だしね。
そんなわけで、サンクレッドとウリエンジェは、
より詳しい状況を知るために帝都ガレマルドへ向かったわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_018<tab>Until such time as they do, the Allied leaders feel it would be unwise to interfere in the conflict. And so, thanks in part to the imperial withdrawal from Ghimlyt, they have decided to turn their attention to the primal problem once more.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_018<tab>それから、もうひとつ……。
ギムリトから帝国軍が退いたこともあって、
盟主たちは、新たな蛮神対策に乗り出したの。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_019<tab>Working with friendly factions among the beast tribes, they hope to reopen dialogue and explore new avenues for peace.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_019<tab>蛮族たちの中でも、友好的な派閥と連携を取りつつ、
対話による和解の可能性を模索しているのよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_020<tab>Given the timing, I suspect they wish to put their respective houses in order ahead of a decisive clash with the Empire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_020<tab>帝国との最終決戦を見据えて、
今のうちに、足元の問題を解決しておきたいのでしょうね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_021<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_021<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_022<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_022<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_023<tab>Whatever their intent, this is not a problem easily solved. The Lominsans, in particular, struggle in their efforts, and Alphinaud and Y'shtola have been called upon to aid them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_023<tab>とはいえ、この問題は簡単に解決できるものじゃない。
案の定、リムサ・ロミンサでは対策が難航しているらしくて、
アルフィノくんとヤ・シュトラが駆り出されていったわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_024<tab>So long as we are dealing with the tempered, I'm afraid no amount of dialogue will avail us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_024<tab>相手が蛮神召喚に手を染めたテンパードなら、
対話すら、ままならないものね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>But if we can develop a treatment for tempering, then anything is possible!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>でも、だからこそ、テンパードの治療法が確立できれば、
蛮神問題の打開策にもなるはず……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_026<tab>Which is why we must succeed.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_026<tab>ああ、新たな道を拓くためにも、
シドたちの力を借りて、必ず治療法を完成させよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_027<tab>And on that cheery note, why not make yourselves comfortable in Dawn's Respite? I'll show Cid in as soon as he arrives!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_027<tab>シドさんがいらっしゃったら、未明の間にご案内しまっす！
休憩がてら、しばらくそちらでお待ちくだっさい！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_030<tab>I understand you took a little trip to Azys Lla. Raha made himself useful, I trust?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_030<tab>そちらは、魔大陸に行ったそうね。
ラハくんの活躍ぶりは、どうだったかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_031<tab>We've made the Respite cozier than ever. You're going to love it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_031<tab>未明の間の調度品を整えてみまっした。
会議や休息などに、ご利用くだっさい！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_032<tab>Cid, at long last...
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_032<tab>いよいよ、シドたちに会えるんだな……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_033<tab>As important as Ga Bu is to me, I know only too well how much more is at stake here. A cure could change the whole world.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_033<tab>私としては、ガ・ブを救いたい一心だったけど、
テンパードの治療は世界が待望しているのよね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_034<tab><blip> <bloop> Warning: His Highness is exhibiting elevated blood pressure.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_034<tab>ピピ……殿下の血圧の上昇を感知しました。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_040<tab>Cid!
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_040<tab>シド……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_100_041<tab>Forgive us for not coming to see you sooner, my friend. As you may have heard, we've had our hands full.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_100_041<tab>挨拶に来るのが遅くなって、すまなかった。
なかなか厄介な案件で立て込んでてな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_041<tab>In our defense, you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> up rather early. I was under the impression you'd be slumbering awhile longer.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_041<tab>しかし、予定よりずいぶんと早いお目覚めじゃないか？
お前を起こすって張り切ってたウェッジたちが驚いてたぞ、
グ・ラハ・ティア。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_042<tab>Oh, I would have been─had you not fulfilled your promise.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_042<tab>なに、あんたたちは約束を果たしてくれたさ。
だから今、ここにこうしてオレがいる。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_100_043<tab>Hah! I still struggle with that idea. From where I stand, the secrets of traversing time and space seem exactly as unfathomable as they ever did.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_100_043<tab>事情を聞いても、にわかには信じられなかったがな。
時空超越理論なんて、今はまだ雲をつかむような話……
一生を費やしたって到達できるかわからない大物だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_043<tab>But if an alternate version of myself has already laid them bare, I daresay that frees me up to concentrate on other endeavors. Speaking of which, you wanted my help with something. What is it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_043<tab>だが、どこかの俺がそれをやり遂げたなら、
「もうひとつの未来」の俺は、さらに大物を狙うのも悪くない。
……で、今回はどんな案件だ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_044<tab>Well, well...a treatment for tempering. And for the next step, you need to find the password to this Allagan's report...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_044<tab>なるほど、テンパードの治療とは思い切ったな。
そのためにも、まずは玉っころのパスワード解析が必要ってわけか。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_045<tab>Just so. With nary a clue to guide us, we could be here forever and still not guess correctly. And thus we turn to you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_045<tab>推測しようにも、取っ掛かりがなくてな。
当てずっぽうで試していては、時間がいくらあっても足りない。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_046<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_046<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_047<tab>Well, I'd love to say that we could help you...so I will. Once suitably configured, a magitek terminal should make short work of identifying the password.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_047<tab>なら、俺たちの技術を頼ったのは正解だな。
高速で何通りもの処理ができる魔導端末なら、
パスワードを解析できるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_048<tab>I knew I could rely on you. Now, anticipating that it might be of use, I took the liberty of borrowing a tomestone from Rammbroes. It contains an Allagan dictionary.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_048<tab>そう言ってくれると思って、ラムブルースから、
アラグ語の辞書が収められたトームストーンを借りておいた。
これ、使ってくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_049<tab>Good thinking. I'll transfer the information to a terminal and set it to work right away.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_049<tab>ありがたい。
さっそく魔導端末に読み込ませて、解析を始めよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_101<tab>Ah, looks like it's finished. Let's see...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_101<tab>よし、済んだようだな。
なになに……

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_102<tab>“Freedom.” The password is “freedom.”
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_102<tab>じ・ゆ・う……？
そうか、自由か……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_103<tab>Hah. Short and simple, just as I said. Would you care to do the honors, Your Highness?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_103<tab>ずいぶんとシンプルな答えなのね。
ま、とにかく解除を試してみましょうよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_104<tab>I would, milady!
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_104<tab>ああ、そうしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_105<tab>Node, open the report entitled “Eikonic Corruption ─ An Overview,” password: freedom!
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_105<tab>パスワード入力……じゆう！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_106<tab>Password accepted. <bloop> Opening report...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_106<tab>パスワード認証……。
ピピ……「闘神の汚染者に関するレポート」を開きます……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_107<tab>This report seeks to provide an overview of the mechanism by which eikons corrupt and bind men to their will.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_107<tab>このレポートでは主に、
なぜ、闘神によって人は従属を強制され、
「汚染者」になってしまうのかを解説していく。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_108<tab>The phenomenon we call “corruption” refers to the alteration of the aether of the soul.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_108<tab>結論から言えば汚染者とは、
「魂」を構成するエーテルが変容した者である。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_109<tab>Said aether ordinarily exists in equilibrium; no one element being more prominent than another.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_109<tab>通常、人の魂を構成するエーテルは、
ひとつの属性に偏らない、バランスの取れた状態になっている。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_110<tab>But when a subject is exposed to the aether of an eikon, this changes, their soul taking on the properties of the entity in question.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_110<tab>しかし、闘神のエーテル放射を浴びることによって、
魂は、その闘神が有する性質、つまり属性に捻じ曲げられてゆく。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_111<tab>By way of an example, exposure to the aether of the Fiend, Sephirot, would cause a subject's aether to become aligned with the element of earth.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_111<tab>例えば、魔神セフィロトのエーテル放射を浴びた場合、
魂のエーテルは、土属性へと変容してゆく。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_112<tab>As a consequence, the subject would attain heightened affinity with earth-aspected magicks, as well as preternatural levels of endurance. Repeated exposure would further enhance these traits, ultimately altering the subject's very flesh.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_112<tab>これにより、土属性の魔法を容易く扱えるようになったり、
異常な耐久力を得て、戦闘能力が高まったりする。
そして、これを繰り返すと、やがて肉体までもが変化するのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_113<tab>The changes undergone by the subject are not solely attributable to elemental alignment, however. Further testing has determined that the subject's soul becomes umbrally charged, or stagnant during the process.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_113<tab>また、汚染者たちの魂を調査したところ、
属性のみならず、霊極性化が進行していることが判明した。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_114<tab>This stagnation of the soul has the effect of diluting the sense of self, rendering the subject vulnerable to the will of the eikon, the thoughts of whom come to consume their entire existence.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_114<tab>霊極性とは、すなわち停滞の極性である。
おそらく、魂が霊極性化することで自我が薄められた結果、
闘神に対する信仰心ばかりが、際立つことになるのだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_115<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_115<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_116<tab>In this manner do the corrupted become worshipers of the eikon, their prayers serving to further empower the entity.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_116<tab>こうして汚染者たちは、闘神だけを崇めるようになり、
その信仰心を糧に、闘神はさらなる力を得るのである。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_117<tab>Having discerned the mechanism of eikonic corruption, my colleagues and I set out to develop a material capable of shielding one from its effects. An endeavor in which we were successful, albeit it at great cost...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_117<tab>私はこの研究から、闘神のエーテル放射を遮断し、
汚染者となることを防ぐ、特殊な素材を開発することに成功した。
しかし……

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_118<tab>In the course of testing, many of my assistants─good men and women all─fell victim to corruption. And in accordance with protocol, they were summarily put to death.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_118<tab>しかし、その研究のため、多くの部下が汚染者となり、
無情にも……処分されてしまった。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_119<tab>I subsequently submitted a proposal to investigate potential cures for corruption, but it was rejected─deemed “nonessential” by Lord Amon.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_119<tab>私は、汚染者の治療法の研究を申請したが、
アモン様の必要なしという一言で却下されてしまった。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_120<tab>Though I knew it would be fruitless, I protested the decision. And for my impertinence, I have been stripped of rank and title, and will shortly be expelled from this facility.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_120<tab>そして異議を唱えた私は、
魔科学研究所から追放されたのだ。
おそらく、このレポートも登録抹消されていることだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_121<tab>In all likelihood, this report will be expunged from the archives. Nonetheless, I record it in the hope that one day, someone will undertake to do that which I could not, and find a cure for the victims of eikonic corruption. End recording.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_OWEN_000_121<tab>いつの日か、汚染者の治療に挑む者が現れることを願いつつ、
レポートを終える……。
以上……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_122<tab>So not even the Allagans were able to find a cure. Or rather, were not given the chance to do so. One cannot help but wonder what motivated Lord Amon's decision.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_122<tab>そうか……。
アラグ文明でも、テンパード化の治療法は、
確立できなかったんだな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_123<tab>More importantly, this confirms that stagnation of the soul is indeed the problem─and Angelo can remedy that.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_123<tab>だけど、テンパード化が、
魂が不活性化された状態だっていう推測は証明されたわ。
なら、アンジェロで活性化してやれば……

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_124<tab>True. Yet were we simply to reanimate a tempered soul, I fear it would do naught to diminish the individual's fanatical faith. Indeed, it may well intensify it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_124<tab>理屈は正しい。
……が、そのまますべてを活性化させれば、
蛮神への信仰心まで高めてしまうんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_125<tab>No, we would somehow need to suppress the primal's hold over the subject at the same time, or risk them ever remaining its thrall.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_125<tab>それじゃあ結局、偽りの信徒のままだ。
まずは増幅させられた信仰心を戻してやらないと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_A1_000_001<tab>If we could only make them remember who they were...
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_A1_000_001<tab>本来の自分を思い出せれば……

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_A1_000_002<tab>So there's no point in reviving their souls unless we can also restore their sense of self?
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_A1_000_002<tab>活性化以外に、自我を取り戻させる方法は？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_127<tab>But of course─memory transference! The process has the effect of compartmentalizing memories─separating them into manageable bundles, if you will.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_127<tab>そうだ……アラグの記憶継承術……！
あの術は、記憶を移せるようにする過程で、
いわば「記憶をくるむ」みたいな作用をするんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_100_127<tab>By adapting the technique, it may be possible to achieve <var 1A 02 /var>selective<var 1A 01 /var> reanimation. That is, limit the effects to only those memories that existed prior to tempering.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_100_127<tab>術をうまく改変できれば、
テンパードになる前の記憶は活性化魔法が効きやすいように、
なった後の分は効きにくいように……と分けられるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_200_127<tab>Through thus restoring the sense of self, we could theoretically drown out the incitements of false faith which had come to dominate the individual's thoughts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_200_127<tab>そうして自我を優先的に目覚めさせられたら、
無意識の己を支配していた偽りの信仰心を掃えもするだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_100_128<tab>I see... The theory seems sound. And our experience treating the Light-corrupted <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> help us to identify suitable memories for reanimation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_100_128<tab>確かに……活性化させるべき記憶の選別も、
罪喰い化の治療における理論が使えそうだけど……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_128<tab>But are you confident you can adapt memory transference as required? I seem to recall your attempts to do so while trying to bring us home culminated in literal bloodletting.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_128<tab>でも、術の改変って、簡単にはできないでしょう？
私たちを帰還させようとしてたときだって……
結局、うまくいかなかったのよね？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_129<tab>They did, you are right. Despite my best efforts, I could not recreate the mechanism. And I concede that the rather clumsy compromise I reached would not provide the basis for a cure.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_129<tab>ああ、まあな……。
少しずつ改変した術式を何通りも試したが、
正解は見つけられなかった。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>Then perhaps it's better that we consider another approach.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_130<tab>だったら、ほかの方法を探したほうが……

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_131<tab>Your doubts are understandable, but this time I believe we have reason to be confident.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_131<tab>いや、まだ光明はある……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_132<tab>You see, nodes such as this were built with the ability to simulate magicks.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_132<tab>こいつみたいなアラグの球形汎用システムには、
機械的に魔法を再現する機構が組み込まれてるんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_133<tab>Which leads me to believe that it may be capable of performing simulations of the transference technique. If so, we would be able to conduct years' worth of tests within the space of a few days.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_133<tab>これを利用して、改変した術式を、
仮想的に試すことはできないか……！？
そのやり方なら、短時間で何百、何千通りも試せるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_134<tab>Hm. In theory, it would be no different from how we identified the password.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_134<tab>なるほど、パスワードの割り出しと同じ方法を使うわけか。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_135<tab>But it'll take more calculating power. A lot more. I honestly couldn't say whether our equipment would be up to the task.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_135<tab>たしかに魔導端末と玉っころを接続して制御を乗っ取ればいける。
だが、膨大な計算をこなすための演算能力が必要だろう。
今の俺たちの技術でできるかどうか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_136<tab>Tell me, Cid. Why do you suppose Owen locked his report behind a password?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_136<tab>なあ、シド……
オーエンがレポートにパスワードをかけてたのは、
なぜだと思う？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_137<tab>To keep it from prying eyes, of course. Why else?
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_137<tab>そりゃあ、セキュリティの問題……

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_138<tab>...Wait. A password that could be guessed by anyone with leisure and a dictionary wouldn't keep it from a person minded to look.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_138<tab>……違うな。
総当たりで崩せる程度のパスワードに、ほとんど意味はない。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_139<tab>No, he <var 1A 02 /var>wanted<var 1A 01 /var> his report to be seen...by those who strive for freedom.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_139<tab>これは魔科学者オーエンからのメッセージだ。
「自由」を求める心がある者にこそ、読んでもらいたい、と。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_140<tab>Not unlike the members of a certain distinguished engineering collective. I believe their motto was “Freedom through Technology,” or some such.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_140<tab>同じだよな。
技術は自由のために……ってさ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_141<tab>You two─round up as many magitek terminals as you can find and bring them to the workshop.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_141<tab>ウェッジ、ビッグス、ありったけの魔導端末を、
レヴナンツトールの工房に集めるんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_WEDGE_000_142<tab>Right away, Chief!
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_WEDGE_000_142<tab>了解ッスー！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_143<tab>Things are about to get very busy. Lucky we have you to help, eh?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_143<tab>さあ、こっからは大忙しだ。
すまないが、お前たちにも協力してもらうぞ？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_150<tab>We're getting there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. One step at a time.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_150<tab>目的に一歩ずつ近づいているわね。
このまま突き進みましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_151<tab>As with our first foray into the Labyrinth of the Ancients, we seek to venture into the unknown. And in order to succeed, we require not only knowledge and preparation, but daring besides. Just like old times.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_151<tab>未知の領域に踏み込むには、
知恵と作戦、それから勢いも大事だろ？
「古代の民の迷宮」に乗り込んだときみたいにさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_152<tab>Suffice it to say, I shall be of whatever help I can.
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_152<tab>もちろん、私たちも力いっぱい手伝わせてもらうわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_153<tab>Hmmm, all those magitek terminals won't come cheap... Ack, shut up, Tataru. Some things you shouldn't put a price on.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_000_153<tab>たくさんの端末を用意してもらうとなると、おいくら……
いえいえ、ここは世界のためにも太っ腹でいきまっす。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_154<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_DATASYSTEM_000_154<tab>………………。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_160<tab>Right, while G'raha Tia and I configure the terminals, I want the rest of you to procure supplies.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_160<tab>魔導端末のセッティングは、
俺たちとグ・ラハ・ティアに任せてくれればいい。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_161<tab>Namely, ceruleum to fuel the terminals and ice shards to keep them cool. The more we have of both, the better.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_161<tab>お前たちには、端末をフル稼働させるために必要な、
燃料の青燐水と、冷却用のアイスシャードの調達を頼みたい。
どちらも、あればあるほどいい。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_162<tab>Leave the ice shards to me. I'll round up some adventurers and go on a gathering spree.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_000_162<tab>アイスシャードの調達なら任せて。
「石の家」の冒険者のみんなと人海戦術で集めてくるわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_163<tab>In that case, I'll trust <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and Alisaie with the ceruleum. Here's a promissory note for each of you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_163<tab>なら、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
アリゼーと分担して、青燐水の調達を頼む。
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>」を渡しておこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_164<tab>Take them to the Skysteel Manufactory in Ishgard and the Ceruleum Processing Plant in Thanalan. The people there will give you what we need.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_164<tab>それぞれ、イシュガルドの「スカイスチール機工房」と、
ウルダハの「青燐精製所」に向かい、
その手形で青燐水を調達してきてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_165<tab>Yours is a well-known face in the Holy See, I believe? If it's all the same to you, I'll head to Thanalan.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_ALISAIE_000_165<tab>イシュガルドの方は任せていいかしら？
あなたの方が、何かと顔が利くでしょうしね。
私はウルダハに行ってくるわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_168<tab>If Alisaie's bound for the Ceruleum Processing Plant, you'll want to take yourself to the Skysteel Manufactory. Off you go, now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_CID_000_168<tab>アリゼーがウルダハに向かったなら、
お前はイシュガルドの「スカイスチール機工房」に行って、
青燐水を調達してきてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_169<tab>We shall see to it the terminals are ready by the time you return.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_GRAHATIA_000_169<tab>悪いが、青燐水の調達は任せた。
あんたが戻ってくる頃には、
魔導端末のセッティングを済ませておくよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_100_170<tab>We're about to set out for the ice shards. I suggest we all compare spoils when we return.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_KRILE_100_170<tab>これからみんなで、アイスシャードの調達に向かうところよ。
あなたは青燐水をよろしくね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_100_171<tab>The workshop hasn't been used for a while. I'll have to give it a good clean!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_TATARU_100_171<tab>レヴナンツトールの工房も久しく使ってませんでっした。
端末を運ぶ前にしっかりお掃除しておきまっす！

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_170<tab>You stand in the Skysteel Manufactory. What is it you require?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_170<tab>こちらは「スカイスチール機工房」です。
本日は、どういったご用件でしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_171<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. How may I serve you this day?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_171<tab>ようこそ、いらっしゃいました。
本日は、機工士としての用件ではないようですが……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_172<tab>So you are after ceruleum. In that case, please present the note to our engineer at the airship landing. He shall be glad to assist you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_172<tab>かしこまりました、青燐水の調達ですね。
お手数ですが、イシュガルド・ランディングまでご足労いただき、
担当の技師に改めて手形をお渡しください。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_175<tab>Please present the note to our engineer at the airship landing. He shall be glad to assist you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_FROMELAUT_000_175<tab>青燐水の調達でしたら、
お手数ですが、イシュガルド・ランディングまでご足労いただき、
担当の技師に改めて手形をお渡しください。

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SKYSTEELENGINEER04009_000_180<tab>Ceruleum? You've come to the right man. Fair warnin', though: the price has shot up on account of the uncertainty with the Empire, so I hope you've got the coin!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SKYSTEELENGINEER04009_000_180<tab>青燐水なら俺が扱っている。
情勢不安で高騰しているが、現金払いでいいか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SKYSTEELENGINEER04009_000_181<tab>Well now, a promissory note from the Ironworks. Don't see many of these. Not that it's a problem─it's as good as gold to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMJ103_04009_SKYSTEELENGINEER04009_000_181<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E907101 /var>とは恐れ入った。
額面どおりの青燐水を持ってってくれ。
